Detailed Description

template<typename weight_t>
class bitpit::DiscreteStencil< weight_t >

Metafunction for generating a discretization stencil.

Template Parameters
weight_tis the type of the weights stored in the stencil

Definition at line 60 of file stencil.hpp.

void bitpit::DiscreteStencil< weight_t >::appendItem ( long  id,
const weight_t &  weight 
)

Append an item the stencil.

The item will be appended to the stencil also if the stencil already contains an item with the same id.

Parameters
idis the index that will be set
weightis the weight that will be set

◆ clear()

template<typename weight_t >
void bitpit::DiscreteStencil< weight_t >::clear ( bool  release = false)

Clears the items of the stencil.

Removes all items from the stencil (which are destroyed), leaving it with a size of 0.

Parameters
releaseif it's true the memory hold by the stencil will be released, otherwise the stencil will be cleared but its memory will not be relased

Definition at line 545 of file stencil.tpp.

◆ sumItem()

template<typename weight_t >
void bitpit::DiscreteStencil< weight_t >::sumItem ( long  id,
const weight_t &  value 
)

Sum the given value to the item of the stencil with the specified index.

If an item with the same id already exists, the given value will be summed to the weight of the existing item. Otherwise, a new item will be appended.

Parameters
idis the index of the item
valueis the value that will be summed

Definition at line 453 of file stencil.tpp.
